description: In 2015 there is one rule. You can take your time but don’t take mine. We want immediate gratification, especially when it comes to sex. We are a society of horny teenagers. But in NYC if they aren’t walking distance than forget it. Instant pleasure is what we are looking for. Swipe 2 is a look at how our models use apps to find hot hook-up sex. Watch as our boys feed their insatiable desires by finding straight curious guys.
title: Swipe Part 2
